sentences.en: Drink water more, rest more, had better go out to perspire all over.
sentences.cn: 多喝水,多休息, 最好出一次透汗.

sentences.en: He began to perspire as he climbed the hill into Highgate.
sentences.cn: 当他爬上山坡,到达海格特时,已是汗流浃背了.

sentences.en: I aspire but I perspire , too. It gets better results.
sentences.cn: 我非常的想但我知道这要汗水, 才可以得到更好的结果.

sentences.en: I don't perspire. I am a private citizen, yet I receive fan mail.
sentences.cn: 我可不跟他们一起发疯, 我行事向来低调, 虽然我常收到粉丝们的信件.

sentences.en: It can make you freeze, panic, chatter aimlessly, lose your train of thought or perspire profusely.
sentences.cn: 它会让你思维冻结 、 恐慌 、 漫无目的地闲扯、无法思考、紧张得满身大汗.

sentences.en: On the scorching summer day, he who is apt to sweat will perspire heavily.
sentences.cn: 炎炎夏日, 爱出汗的他挥汗成雨.

sentences.en: People considered it as an honor to pay strength and perspire for it.
sentences.cn: 大家把为大桥出的一点力,流的一点汗,当作光荣和幸福.

sentences.en: Perspire have profit to the body and skin?
sentences.cn: 出汗对身体和皮肤有好处 吗 ?

sentences.en: Perspire on the face urticant how to do?
sentences.cn: 脸上一出汗就痒怎么办?

sentences.en: Perspire on the skin can you come to the dirty stuff eduction in wool stoma?
sentences.cn: 皮肤上出汗能不能把毛细孔里的脏东西排出来?

sentences.en: Stimulate the hair to be toughness, balance the perspire the sedum.
sentences.cn: 平衡皮脂分泌,健胸丰胸,刺激、强健头皮,护发 、 生发.

sentences.en: The child of 6 months often loves to perspire on the head, be normal phenomenon?
sentences.cn: 六个月的孩子头上老爱出汗, 是正常现象 吗 ?

sentences.en: The firs perspire a fine balsam of turpentine.
sentences.cn: 冷杉分泌出一种质地优良的松树胶.

sentences.en: When patient concurrent autonomic nerve pathological change will perspire many.
sentences.cn: 当患者并发自主神经病变时就会出汗多.

trans.tran_en: if you perspire, parts of your body become wet, especially because you are hot or have been doing hard work
